RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 57. Claiming Purse 17900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 11 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 11 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7 ,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LARSA was hustled to the lead soon after the start, set all the pace, widened into the stretch and won under strong urging. LADY ABRIL never far back, rallied into the stretch outside rivals and finished clear for second. DANCING GRACE stalked the pace along the inside into the stretch, shifted to the four path then finished evenly. CAN I GO TOO trailed into the stretch then had a mild late rally in the five path. EASTER PRIDE allowed to settle, improved position along the rail into the stretch then failed to sustain that bid. SASSY POWER chased the winner two wide into the stretch then weakened. CEE CEE'S GOT THIS failed to menace. PENNIESANDDIMES chased the winner three wide into the stretch then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Larsa
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, set pace, drew clear upper stretch, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing Grace
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, shifted 4path, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Can I Go Too
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, mild rally late 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Easter Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Abril
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally outside, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Cee Cee's Got This
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Penniesanddimes
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3 wide, folded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 34. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SALUTE THE KID was fractious in the gate, stalked the pace three wide, forced out to the six path as the leader drifted out entering the stretch, surged under right handed urging and was along in time. MERE BAG OF SHELLS pressed the pace into the turn, made the lead, drifted to the five path entering the stretch, maintained a narrow lead until deep stretch then couldn't handle the winner. TITEBLUEJEANS saved ground, offered a mild bid along the rail into the stretch then leveled off. CABARET FLEUR close up four wide, failed to respond. MISS MARY JEAN rushed to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace along the rail into the turn, had speed into the stretch then weakened. GHOSTLY REVIVAL was no factor. WAY OF THE WORLD was no threat. BEAUTIFULLBLACKSKY was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Mary Jean
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Urieta Johanna
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace inside turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Mere Bag of Shells
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2 wide, assumed command turn, drifted 5path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Salute the Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, stalked pace, 3 wide, carried 6path, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Way of the World
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Ghostly Revival
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Titebluejeans
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, bid into lane, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Beautifullblacksky
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Cabaret Fleur
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 4 wide, failed to respond,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 76. Maiden Special Weight Purse 26400. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PERMAFROST was bumped at the start, shifted inward inside the leader leaving the chute bumping LEOLA and causing a chain reaction of bumping to her inside, prompted the pace two wide into the turn, made the lead before a half, quickly opened a large advantage, ducked in when struck with a right handed whip near the furlong marker, the rider switched to a left handed stick then drew off at will to win as much the best. AURA OF GOLD broke in front then dropped in leaving the chute, set the pace along the inside for nearly a half then was no match for the winner. QUARANTINO was in tight and bumped leaving chute, settled within striking distance in the four path then finished with good courage three wide. LEOLA was bumped at the start then again leaving the chute while forced inward then failed to menace. ATILANO settled inside and was never a threat. O ROMEO bore out at the start bumping LEOLA forcing that one into the stretch, squeezed and bumped leaving chute, had speed into the stretch and faded late. TWELVE MINUS ONE was brushed leaving chute and had brief speed. ALWAYS SPRING was bumped leaving chute, checked between rivals and trailed. THE RIDER OF LEOLA LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF AURA OF GOLD FOR ALLEGED INTEFERENCE SOON AFTER THE START, AFTRE REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Atilano
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Always Spring
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped leaving chute, checked, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Quarantino
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight, bumped leaving chute, finished well, 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Twelve Minus One
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed leaving chute, brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: O Romeo
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out, bumped start, squeezed leaving chute, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Leola
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, leaving chute, forced in, jockey claimed foul,

ENTRY.NAME: Permafrost
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, leaving chute, rallied 2w, ducked in 1/8p,much best

ENTRY.NAME: Aura of Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, dropped inside leaving chute, early pace, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 11 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 11 Allowed 4 lbs. Ma iden, Claiming, Starter, Optional, or Ohio Bred (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EMPIRE'S FIRE pressed the early pace inside, dropped back and shifted out to the three path after a quarter, came on again five wide through the stretch and was along in time. GUN LAP surged three wide under a strong hold into the turn, gained a narrow advantage at the quarter pole, dueled into the stretch, was bumped near the furlong marker then couldn't handle the winner. LUCKY STREAK battled for the lead three then two wide into the stretch, bumped the runner up past mid stretch and was outfinished. OWN THE TOWN went evenly inside. ROMANTIC COWBOY contested the lead two wide then along the inside into the stretch then weakened. CORNER OFFICE had good early speed and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Gun Lap
ENTRY.COMMENT: surged 3wide under hold, narrow lead, bumped 1/8p, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Empire's Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, dropped back, came again 5 wide, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Romantic Cowboy
ENTRY.OWNER: McDonald James H and Authentic Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Own the Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Streak
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3-2wide, bumped rival 1/8pole, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Corner Office
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, faded,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 31. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VILLAGE CAT bumped at the start, sprinted to the lead soon thereafter, set all the pace, widened into the stretch and won under strong handling. BOLD NICKY bumped at the start, chased the winner and finished second best in the three path. MANDOLIN BREEZE bumped at the start, stalked the pace and went evenly. MOST ADORABLE bore in at the start bumping CANELA FINA was in tight shortly after then failed to menace. EMERALD EYES was in tight and checked leaving the chute then passed tiring rivals through the stretch. CANELA FINA was fractious in the gate, bumped then in tight at the start, improved position along the rail on the turn then came up empty. HONEYBEE STINGS also in tight at the start, had brief speed, inside. MY TWO JAKES was no factor. HALO EFFECT was through early. LISTEN LINDA LOU checked leaving the chute and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Listen Linda Lou
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked chute, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Honeybee Stings
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, brief speed, inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Emerald Eyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight, checked leaving chute, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Canela Fina
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, bumped, in tight start,

ENTRY.NAME: Most Adorable
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, in tight leaving chute, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Mandolin Breeze
ENTRY.OWNER: Emerson Equistions LLC and Bestard Brian
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, stalked pace, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Village Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, sprinted clear, widened, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Nicky
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, chased, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: My Two Jakes
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Halo Effect
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAN'S CHOICE unhurried early, rallied in the six path under left handed urging, was bumped by the leader past the furlong marker and proved best by a under strong handling. RAY'S EMPIRE vied for the lead three wide, rallied to make the lead near the quarter pole, set the pace until deep stretch, bumped the winner and finished gamely for second. KNOCK WOOD close from the start, offered a bid four wide into the stretch then was outfinished 6path. TIER ONE allowed to settle, found his best stride late in the five path. HARSH TRUTH was bumped at the start and closed a gap late in the six path. GOOD MUSIC failed to menace. FAST CLIP away alertly, set the pace along the inside for a half then weakened late. JOSH'N bumped HARSH TRUTH at the start, had good early speed then faded. SYNERGISTIC well placed inside, failed to respond. ELECTION INTEGRITY was no threat. SHOWTIME BOY chased the pace two wide for a half then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Showtime Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased half, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Man's Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, rallied 6path, left urging, bumped 1/8pole, all out,

ENTRY.NAME: Tier One
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, best stride late 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Synergistic
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Good Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Clip
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 1/4 pole, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Harsh Truth
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, late gain, 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Josh'n
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, good early speed, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Election Integrity
ENTRY.OWNER: Mine to Equine LLC and Karras James
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Ray's Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, assumed command upper stretch, bumped,

ENTRY.NAME: Knock Wood
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 4 wide, outfinished 6path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: J. William Petro Memorial S. THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 88. Stakes Purse 75000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE-YEAR-OLDS AND UPWARD REGISTERED OHIO FOALS (WHICH REFLECTS $26,250 FROM THE OHIO THOROUGHBRED FUND). Foaled in the State of Ohio as per requirements set forth by the Ohio State Racing Commission. Nomination fee is $50. $262 to enter with an additional $488 to start, with a purse of $75,000, of which 60% to the winner, 20% to second, 10% to third, 5% to fourth, 3% to fifth and 2% to sixth. Nominations Closed Monday, May 2nd, 2022 with 16 Nominations. Weights: Three-year-olds 11 9 lbs; Older 123 lbs. Non-Winners of $30,000 Twice in 2022-2023 allowed 2 lbs; A Race other Maiden, Claiming, Optional or Starter since November 11th, 2022 allowed 4 lbs; A Race other Maiden, Claiming, Optional or Starter since May 11th, 2022 allowed 6 lb s Starters to be named through the entry box Monday, May 8th, 2022. A Trophy will be presented to the Winning Owner. This stake will not split. In the event more than fourteen (14) horses pass the entry box at the time of closing of entries, preference wi
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANDLELIGHT HOURS allowed to settle, rallied three wide on the far turn and into the stretch, made the lead near the three sixteenths pole, was put to left handed urging, edged away late and won under confident handling. SALLY STRONG chased the pace for six furlongs, loomed boldly two wide entering the stretch and finished second best. R THREE ANGELS sprinted to a clear lead after the start, set the pace to the top of the stretch then was outfinished. WINDY LU WHO well placed inside, angled out on the far turn, swung out to the eight path entering the stretch and improved position while no threat. POWER BANKER chased the pace for six furlongs then weakened. GOODNESS SAKES trailed, stopped in the stretch and jogged to the wire.

ENTRY.NAME: Windy Lu Who
ENTRY.OWNER: Pocket Aces Racing LLC and Susan Anderson Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, inside, angled out 2nd turn, improved position,

ENTRY.NAME: Sally Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, loomed boldly 2 wide top lane, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Candlelight Hours
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, rallied 3w, left handed urging, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Power Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2nd turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Goodness Sakes
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, stopped stretch, jogged to wire

ENTRY.NAME: R Three Angels
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace 3/16pole, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Special Weight Purse 26400. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JACK'S YACHT QUEEN with the second flight two wide, shifted out to the middle of the racetrack entering the stretch, rallied under right handed urging and was along in time. URBAN COWGIRL pressed the pace two wide and finished second best in the six path. COROMANDEL made the lead shortly after the start, set the pace until deep stretch and was outfinished. FLASH OF CHEROKEE stalked the pace three wide and went evenly. INSIDE GIRL hesitated at the start and was no threat. SISTER CODE failed to menace. FULL TIME STRUTIN with the second flight inside, faded in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Inside Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitated start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Code
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Coromandel
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, inside late stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Flash of Cherokee
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Full Time Strutin
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Urban Cowgirl
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Jack's Yacht Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight 2 wide, shifted mid track, rallied right urging,
